message: I'd like to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product for $1800000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1600000.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this exceptional product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1700000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1650000.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1680000.
I understand your position, but I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our needs. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1660000.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm starting to think it's time to consider other options. I'm willing to meet you at $1675000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1665000.
